subject: Hockey, Ice
Sports Injuries
lead_paragraph: Zuccarello, a forward popular with teammates and New York fans, has bounced back from a frightening head injury in the playoffs, and he and the team have had a good start to the season.
snippet: Zuccarello, a forward popular with teammates and New York fans, has bounced back from a frightening head injury in the playoffs, and he and the team have had a good start to the season.
